slide-1.title: 12D Thunder
content: 12D Thunder comes with a new bonus system. Join the exciting game and win bonuses up to 500x your bet! Let the lightning bring you big wins!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: 12D Thunder is a game where you predict the number where the ball will stop on the 12D board. There is 1 jackpot and 12 numbers in red and black.

slide-3.title: Thunder Bonus
content: Thunder will strike 1 to 5 spots on the 12D board randomly. If the ball lands on the thunder spot, you have a chance to win Thunder Bonus from 20x to 500x your bet.
